name: Celestial Word
summary: You can call forth a holy word from the celestial realms to punish your foes.
description:
You can call forth a holy word from the celestial realms to punish your foes. Once per day, you can cast divine decree as a 7th-level divine innate spell. You must choose good for the spell's alignment, and you can Cast the Spell regardless of whether you worship a deity or what their alignment is.Traits

Aasimar: A creature with this trait has the aasimar versatile heritage. Aasimars are planar scions descended from celestial beings. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by aasimars.
